subject: Basketball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Minnesota Timberwolves Coach Kurt Rambis said there was a chance that the All-Star forward Kevin Love could miss the rest of the season because of a strained left groin.
snippet: Minnesota Timberwolves Coach Kurt Rambis said there was a chance that the All-Star forward Kevin Love could miss the rest of the season because of a strained left groin.
